Article.ArticleTitle: Bioactive prenylated C6-C3 derivatives from the stems and leaves of Illicium fargesii.

Abstract.AbstractText: Seventeen new prenylated C6-C3 derivatives, namely, illifargeins A-M (1-13), including three pairs of enantiomers (1, 5, and 12) and one norillifargeal A (14), together with eight known analogues (15-22), were isolated from the stems and leaves of Illicium fargesii. The structures of the new compounds were elucidated using spectroscopic data (UV, IR, 1D and 2D NMR, and HRESIMS). Their absolute configurations were determined by using experimental and calculated ECD data analysis, as well as a modified Mosher's method. Compounds 1a, 1b, 2, 3, 5a, 7, 10, 11, 15, 16, 19, and 20 showed potential activity against Coxsackie virus B3, with IC50 values ranging from 6.23 to 33.33 µM. Compounds 9 and 15 exhibited potential activity against influenza virus A, with IC50 values of 11.11 and 19.24 µM, respectively. Compounds 2, 3, and 18 exhibited potential anti-oxidant activity, with IC50 values ranging from 1.43 to 6.71 µM.
